title: Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture (1980-2014)
description:
NOTE: Due to the size of the torrent, please seed it since everyone else can suffer through these abominations of movies.

Almost every film that was awarded the Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture. Ghosts Can't Do It (co-winner, 1990) is damn near impossible to find (it never got an official DVD release), so it's not here.

1. Can't Stop the Music [MP4]
2. Mommie Dearest [MP4]
3. The Lonely Lady [MP4]
4. Inchon (It was a TV rip on YouTube that I downloaded part by part and edited together through Movie Maker; that's why the quality is shit.) [MP4]
5. Bolero [AVI]
6. Rambo: First Blood Part II [AVI]
7. Howard the Duck [AVI] and Under the Cherry Moon [AVI] (tie)
8. Leonard Part 6 [AVI]
9. Cocktail [AVI]
10. Star Trek V: The Final Frontier [MP4]
11. The Adventures of Ford Fairlane [AVI] (it tied with Ghosts Can't Do It)
12. Hudson Hawk [MP4]
13. Shining Through [AVI]
14. Indecent Proposal [AVI]
15. Color of Night [AVI]
16. Showgirls [MP4]
17. Striptease [AVI]
18. The Postman [MP4]
19. Burn Hollywood Burn [AVI]
20. Wild Wild West [MP4]
21. Battlefield Earth [MP4]
22. Freddy Got Fingered [AVI]
23. Swept Away (2002)
24. Gigli [AVI]
25. Catwoman [AVI]

27. Basic Instinct 2 [Unrated version] [AVI]
28. I Know Who Killed Me [AVI]

32. Jack and Jill [AVI]
